{"step_by_step_thinking": "A solid solution is a solid-state mixture of two or more metals. Amalgam is a mixture of mercury with another metal, but it is not a solid solution because it is not in a solid state. Cobalt-chromium is a type of solid solution used in medical implants. Silver-palladium is also a solid solution used in dental alloys. Gallium-silver is not a solid solution because gallium is a liquid at room temperature.", "answer_choice": "B. Cobalt-chromium"}
